edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.RequirementsManager.tabs

Class RequirementListPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.RequirementsManager.tabs.RequirementListPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class RequirementListPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The innermost JPanel for the list of all requirements tab, which displays the requirement's information.
    Version:
    Apr 14, 2013
    Author:
    Tianyu Li
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
